duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and coordinate work across the BOLD portfolio to ensure positive relationships, input to solutions, and execution to meet the company's localization goals.
Develop and mentor a team of Localization project, technical and QA managers, and linguists.
Lead the International expansion strategy, oversee a localization management system and AI tools, and establish roadmaps and deadlines for all strategy-related deliverables.
Monitor individual, team, and portfolio performance, and implement improvements to improve knowledge base, efficiency, and effectiveness.
Engage and build relationships with business partners across product, engineering, marketing, and customer support to advise on best practices and launch successful localized products.
Select and manage translation/localization contractors, set quality and delivery standards, approve invoices, and manage the localization budget.
Define and build reporting frameworks and indicators that can effectively track and maintain a data-informed perspective at the project, program, and portfolio level.
Maintain relationships with vendors and continually build empathy in a multilingual/multicultural environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree (localization, business, linguistics, or with equivalent experience) and Master’s degree in Localization, Business Administration, Project Management, or related field is a plus
